welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Revere, a charming city known for its beautiful beaches and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Revere has to offer during your visit."

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights and is home to JetBlue and Delta airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights and is home to American Airlines, United Airlines, and international carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights and is home to JetBlue and international carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: This terminal serves all international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a new login every 45 minutes.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Beverly Municipal Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Beverly Municipal Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hanscom Field Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Hanscom Field Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lawrence Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lawrence Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Memorial Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Memorial Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free.
